value.title: Get the Day of the Week Name and Number in Power BI Using DAX

value.title: Substring in DAX   How to get Part of String Field in Power BI Using DAX Expression
value.excerpt: Substring is one of the most common functions in many languages, However, there is no such function in DAX. value.title: Star schema or single table in Power BI
